KitKat::

She took a few steps  back and growled at the door.  She could smell 
maximals and didn't want a confrontation. But knew it was unavoidable.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> OOC: While robo is back I'll post with Kup and DeathStar
> 
> Nighlight/Elita/Kup/Windlord:
> 
> 
> Elita woke up and cried aloud scared of that noise while Nighlight 
> huged her and looked around.
> 
> Death Starlooked awared looking for the intruder guessing that 
> unicron had sent his minions again.
> 
> Kup and Windlord ran towards CR's trying to find out what's goin on
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "shadowess_azogoth" 
> <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> > KitKat::
> > 
> > She finally stretched and awoke fully in the CR chamber.  She 
> watched 
> > as the links and connections disengaged and the chamer opened up 
> for 
> > her.  She stepped out and looked around. Her nose told her she 
> wasn't 
> > in a pred base.  She transformed into wolf mode and started BASE 
> > INTRUDER ALERT STARTED SOUNDING OFF.  She closed her optics and 
> > winces, "Damn, this just isn't my eon is it?" she muttered and 
> > prepared for battle.
